oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agricultural Sustainability - Progress and Prospects in Crop Research
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop husbandry
Knowledge management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Agricultural Sustainability: Progress and Prospects in Crop Research, covers different aspects of sustainability in a holistic manner and presents a wide range of subject areas by agricultural experts from across the world. The book offers different points of view including important topics in agrobiodiversity, biotechnology, marginal crops, industrial approaches, resource conservation, nutritional enhancement of crops and crop products, and explores economic and political issues.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Bhullar, Gurbir S. and Bhullar, Navreet K. (Eds.) (2013) Agricultural Sustainability - Progress and Prospects in Crop Research. 1st edition. Academic Press. Elsevier, Amsterdam, Bosten, Heidelberg, London, New York, Oxford, Paris, San Diego, San Fransisco, Singapore, Sidney, Tokyo, .
